resources.string: Please allow permission to scan for media
There was a problem getting a thumbnail
Enter a name for the new playlist
There is already a playlist with that name
The min grain number determines how many songs play when you hit thumbs up on a lot of songs. When set to 1, 1 song may repeat after hitting thumbs up a lot.
Enter a positive number for Max Grain Number

The mod magnitude (1-100) determines how much a grain size changes when the thumb up, thumb down, or skip button is tapped. 1 makes the smallest change and 100 makes the largest change. When min grain size is 1 and mod magnitude is 100, a song will take the least number of taps to repeat often. When min grain size is 1 and mod magnitude is 1, a song will take the most number of taps to repeat often.
Enter a number between 1 and 100 for Mod Magnitude
